T02D2842:182a-0: @182a * // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs ngan song sbyong ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2842:182a-1: snying rje chen po yid gzhungs pas //
T02D2842:182a-2: spyan ras gzigs dpal bsnyen byas te //
T02D2842:182a-3: lus can mi 'dod bzhin du lhung //
T02D2842:182a-4: de dag dan 'gro bzlog par bya //
T02D2842:182a-5: sngon nas sbyangs pa nyid dang ni //
T02D2842:182a-6: gzhan dag glo bur bya ba nyid //
T02D2842:182a-7: de bzhin phyi nas gzhan gyis te //
T02D2842:182a-8: mchog dang bar mtha' grangs bzhin 'dod //
T02D2842:182a-9: bdag nyid gang la lhag par dang //
T02D2842:182a-10: me tog lhung ba nyid dam snga //
T02D2842:182a-11: goms par bsnyen par byas pas lha //
T02D2842:182a-12: 'jig rten dbang phyug thugs kar dgod //
T02D2842:182a-13: de nyid lhag pa'i lha yin na //
T02D2842:182a-14: sa bon nam ni lha yi sku //
T02D2842:182a-15: yang yang goms par rang gi sems //
T02D2842:182a-16: de yi thugs bcug ting 'dzin bya //
T02D2842:182a-17: mi g-yo ba dang rtse gcig dang //
T02D2842:182a-18: kun du sdud pa zhes bya ba'i //
T02D2842:182a-20: g-yeng ba spangs la brtan par gnas //
T02D2842:182a-21: spyi bo snying ga lte ba ni //
T02D2842:182a-22: ham dang h'um dang aam bsams nas //
T02D2842:182a-23: bla ma'i man ngag gis gcig tu //
T02D2842:182a-24: bsdus nas 'phen pa thabs yin no //
T02D2842:182a-25: de nas rten la yid 'phrog cing //
T02D2842:182a-26: dmigs pa brtan par gyur pa na //
T02D2842:182a-27: 'od kyi sbu gu'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2842:182a-28: rten de nyid dang de yi zhing //
T02D2842:182a-29: mkhas pas bdag dang bdag gir bya //
T02D2842:182a-30: cho ga'i rgyal po 'di yis ni //
T02D2842:182a-32: dran pa tsam gyis goms pa yis //
T02D2842:182b-0: de ltar ring nas @182b lam goms pa'i //
T02D2842:182b-1: blo ldan dus las 'das gyur tshe //
T02D2842:182b-2: 'phags pa ngan song sbyong dpal gyi //
T02D2842:182b-3: chog bdun phrag bdun du sbyangs //
T02D2842:182b-4: ro 'am rus pa'am gos sam ming //
T02D2842:182b-5: rten de'i mdun du bzhag nas su //
T02D2842:182b-6: ma dag pa dang dag pa yi //
T02D2842:182b-7: dkyil 'khor gnyis la rten gnyis gzhag / brdeg dang bsreg dang bkru ba yis //
T02D2842:182b-8: dri ma gzhig gzhom dad pa dag / dkyil 'khor nag po bya bas te //
T02D2842:182b-9: brtan dang dbang bskur bya ba la'o //
T02D2842:182b-10: yungs kar bye ma thal chen la //
T02D2842:182b-11: rig pa bzlas nas bsnun bya zhing //
T02D2842:182b-12: sbyin sreg cho ga'i bya ba yis //
T02D2842:182b-13: rten bcas bag chags 'bad de bsreg / ngan song sbyong ba'i sku gsung thugs //
T02D2842:182b-14: bzhu pa'i chus bkang bum pa blugs //
T02D2842:182b-15: rdo rje'i glu blang rig pa bzla //
T02D2842:182b-16: ma lus dri ma bkru bar bya //
T02D2842:182b-17: aom a'a:hr'i:sarba du rga ti pa ri shodha ne r'a dz'a ya /
T02D2842:182b-18: aa mu ke k'a ya w'aka tsitta sarba p'a pam to sha wa ra na bham ga bham /
T02D2842:182b-21: sho dha ya sho dha ya phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2842:182b-22: de rjes dri ma dag pa'i sems //
T02D2842:182b-23: lhag pa'i lha la bcug nas ni //
T02D2842:182b-24: ji bzhin dbang bskur byas te mchod //
T02D2842:182b-25: dga' ston chen po sbyin par bya //
